content.question: In context, the simile in lines 5-6 (“Like . . . again”) primarily compares

choices.label: the movement of water to the sorrows of life
an underlying mystery to an outward expression of hope
a natural phenomenon to human behavior
the power of nature to human innovations

content.answer: a natural phenomenon to human behavior

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
